pkgmetadata.longdescription: CuPy is an open-source array library accelerated with NVIDIA CUDA. CuPy provides GPU accelerated computing with Python. CuPy uses CUDA-related libraries including cuBLAS, cuDNN, cuRand, cuSolver, cuSPARSE, cuFFT and NCCL to make full use of the GPU architecture.
